title: Sierra Leone Inflation Rate
description: Inflation Rate in Sierra Leone increased to 29.10 percent in September from 28.20 percent in August of 2022. Inflation Rate in Sierra Leone averaged 27.52 percent from 1986 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 255.56 percent in April of 1987 and a record low of -21.76 percent in January of 2000. In Sierra Leone, the inflation rate measures a broad rise or fall in prices that consumers pay for a standard basket of goods. This page provides - Sierra Leone Inflation Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Statistics Sierra Leone
